title: [Cancer] Highly aggressive breast cancer cells use a molecule called swiprosin-1 to promote the circulation of adhesion receptors, which increases cell migration and formation of metastases. The discovery can impact the direction of cancer studies in the future.

[Neuroscience] Personality traits and hallmarks of Alzheimer’s disease. Researchers found personality can help protect against Alzheimer’s and other neurological diseases by delaying or preventing the emergence of neuropathology for those strong in conscientiousness and low in neuroticism.
